VRPythonInteractorStyleProxy.name: Python

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: File containing python interactor style implementation

VRPythonInteractorStyleProxy.Documentation: This interactor style allows writing custom interaction code in Python. Once added, you can select the style in the list to display the FileName property in the UI, which allows you to choose the Python module to use. The Refresh property in the UI triggers re-reading of the Python module, and it requires you to reconfigure the events. For an example Python interactor style, see Examples/CAVE/CustomPythonInteractorStyle.py in the ParaView source repository.
